comment.author: 27260720@N07
comment._content: The name should be rather Halle Gate or Hal Gate. This gate in the Brussels walls gave onto the southbound road to the city of Halle (Dutch) or Hal (French).

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information.  The titles we had to work with from the photochrom publishers based in Detroit and Zurich tended to be English or German versions of the place names, but we can add a better spelling when we update!

comment._content: sorry pixel has got it wrong The name of the gate in dutch is : Hallepoort The name of the gate in french is : Porte de Hal en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halle_Gate -- Found in a search. ( ?² )
